snippet: An account of Daniel Ellsberg and his release of the Pentagon Papers introduces young readers to the Vietnam War.
abstract: Greg Grandin reviews book Most Dangerous: Daniel Ellsberg and the Secret History of the Vietnam War by Steve Sheinkin.
lead_paragraph: An account of Daniel Ellsberg and his release of the Pentagon Papers introduces young readers to the Vietnam War.
